title: Resignation of the Chief Financial Officer of Ellah Lakes Plc
head_office_address: No. 12 Ihama Road, G.R.A, Benin City, Edo State
detailed_summary:
### Summary of Corporate Disclosure Document

#### Purpose and Nature of the Disclosure
The document serves as a formal announcement regarding the resignation of Mr. Wole Onasanya from his position as Chief Financial Officer (CFO) of Ellah Lakes Plc. It outlines the reasons for his departure and expresses gratitude for his service.

#### Key Dates
- **Resignation Announcement Date**: September 9, 2019
- **Company Incorporation Date**: July 2, 1980
- **Listing on Nigerian Stock Exchange**: January 14, 1993

#### Key Individuals
- **Mr. Wole Onasanya**: Resigned as Chief Financial Officer of Ellah Lakes Plc.
- **Kenechi Ezezika**: Company Secretary, signed the announcement.
- **Board of Directors**: Includes General Z Lekwot (Rtd.), Mr. Frank Ellah, Mr. Chuka Mordi, Mr. Joe Attueyi, Mr. Enotie Ogbebor, and Ms. Osaro Oyegun.

#### Company Information
- **Name**: Ellah Lakes Plc
- **Nature of Business**: Agriculture, specializing in Oil Palm plantations.
- **Operational Regions**: Edo and Delta States, Nigeria.
- **Website**: www.ellahlakes.com

#### Resignation Details
- **Reason for Resignation**: Mr. Onasanya resigned to pursue other opportunities within the Nigerian Financial Services sector.
- **Acknowledgment**: The board of directors expressed gratitude for Mr. Onasanya's service and wished him well in his future endeavors.
- **Future Announcement**: The company will announce the appointment of a new CFO in due course.

#### Regulatory and Compliance Matters
- The document does not specify any regulatory requirements or compliance matters directly related to the resignation but indicates that the company will follow proper procedures in appointing a new CFO.

#### Additional Information
- **Company's Mission**: Ellah Lakes Plc aims to empower the communities in which it operates and is diversifying across the Oil Palm value chain.

This summary encapsulates all significant information from the corporate disclosure document regarding the resignation of the CFO and provides a clear overview of the company's background and future intentions.
